title: EP.47: FOOTBALL IS BACK, JULIO JONES, JAGUARS VS RAIDERS, SAM VS BAKER, TRAINING CAMP, AND MUCH MORE
description: Football is finally back! I can hear Chris Colinsworth, Tony Romo, Troy Aikman, and Al Michaels ALREADY! If you are as excited as we are, make sure you tune in to this episode and all the episodes from this moment on as we take a step further in this journey and do a deep dive into the NFL season. In this episode we talk about Julio joining Tom Brady and the buccaneers and the impact that may have. The first preseason game where we get to see the #1 overall pick in the draft in action. We predict the winner of the QB battle in Carolina. We discuss what we've seen in training camp so far. We even talk about the upcoming fight with Ryan Garcia and Tank Davis also not forgetting about the NBA with the KD/Jaylen Brown trade rumors. Tune in and subscribe for more to come!
dc:creator: Griffin Proctor & Joe Jokonya
